input.description: Name of the configuration which is being used for this run. Allowed values: BLADELOGIC
ITSM change for which the remediation job is to be created.

output.from: bl property remediation job change ticket name
output.to: bl property remediation job change ticket name

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="count(//token) > 1"> <xsl:for-each select="//token[position() < last()]"> <xsl:if test="string-length(text()) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('/', text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

call-process.process-name: :BMC_BladeLogic-AD-Operations_Manager:Compliance:Create Delta Package by Job Run ID
:BMC_BladeLogic-AD-Operations_Manager:Compliance:Create BLPackage Deploy Job from Package Key

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <job-keys> <xsl:copy-of select="//job-key" /> <job-key>${remediation job key}</job-key> </job-keys> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <deploy-job-error-list> <xsl:copy-of select="//error" /> <xsl:if test="'${success status}'='false'"> <error> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${current status message}</xsl:text> </error> </xsl:if> </deploy-job-error-list> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

call-process.process-name: :BMC_BladeLogic-AD-Operations_Manager:v8.0:Job:Add One Time Schedule with SNMP Notification and with Approval

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:if test="'${success status}'='false' or //error"> <deploy-job-error-list> <xsl:copy-of select="//deploy-job-error-list/*" /> <xsl:if test="'${success status}'='false'"> <error>${status message}</error> </xsl:if> </deploy-job-error-list> </xsl:if> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:if test="//deploy-job-error-list/error"> <xsl:copy-of select="//deploy-job-error-list" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="'${success status}'='false'">${error list}</xsl:if> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.from: bl property remediation job change ticket name

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success status}'='false'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${is batch job}'='true'"> <batch-job-error-list> <xsl:copy-of select="//batch-job-error-list/error" /> <error>${status message}</error> </batch-job-error-list> <xsl:copy-of select="//deploy-job-error-list" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <deploy-job-error-list> <xsl:copy-of select="//deploy-job-error-list/error" /> <error>${status message}</error> </deploy-job-error-list> <xsl:copy-of select="//batch-job-error-list" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy-of select="//status-messages/*" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Creates a remediation job. Handles both Deploy and Batch job creation as need be.
